titles.title: A bill to authorize a major medical facility project to modernize inpatient wards at the Department of Veterans Affairs Medical Center in Atlanta, Georgia.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Mr. Filner moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on S. 1396.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

bill.summary:
12/26/2007--Public Law. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Authorizes the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to carry out a major medical facility project for the modernization of inpatient wards at the Department of Veterans Affairs Medical Center, Atlanta, Georgia.
